rows.label: qst710303_msg0001
rows.name:
I've been waiting. How's the
parts collection going?

rows.label: qst710303_msg0101
rows.name:
Yes! With this, all the necessary
machine parts are gathered!

rows.label: qst710303_msg0102
rows.name:
To be able to gather this
many parts... You're quite
something, you all!

rows.label: qst710303_msg0103
rows.name:
This time, the invention
is... I call it the Gennai
Special "Jamming Megaphone"!

rows.label: qst710303_msg0104
rows.name:
This is quite an excellent item that
can amplify your own voice while
drowning out the surrounding sounds!

rows.label: qst710303_msg0105
rows.name:
With this, you just have to record your voice,
so there's no need to worry about how to stop
it like with the last music box, right?

rows.label: qst710303_msg0106
rows.name:
Hmm? Then how far does the
voice reach, you ask? You all
are surprisingly detailed...

rows.label: qst710303_msg0107
rows.name:
Because I gave the sound a special
directionality, no matter how loud I make
the voice, it's about 10 meters at most?

rows.label: qst710303_msg0108
rows.name:
Well, it's not much different
from just shouting, but that's
part of its charm! Hee hee hee!

rows.label: qst710303_msg0109
rows.name:
Now, you all too, look at the
recipe for this epoch-making
invention and follow my lead!

rows.label: qst710303_msg0110
rows.name:
Still, thanks to you all, I've been
able to reaffirm that I can still
go on as an active inventor!

rows.label: qst710303_msg0111
rows.name:
From now on, I'll continue to create
more and more new inventions!

rows.label: qst710303_msg0112
rows.name:
My goal is to be a lifelong
active inventor who continues
to lead the way in Iira!

rows.label: qst710303_msg0113
rows.name:
Well then, you all! You've
been a great help!

rows.label: qst710303_msg0201
rows.name:
To complete this invention,
I still need more machine
parts lying around in Gula!

rows.label: qst710303_msg0203
rows.name:
Also, do you know about the
bright red coils in Gula with
high thermal conductivity?

rows.label: qst710303_msg0204
rows.name:
I'll need a lot of those
for my next invention.

rows.label: qst710303_msg0205
rows.name:
If you find any, could you
prioritize giving them to me?
